definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Some of these make logical sense, in terms of different temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 不同的温度梯度或许可以部分解释这种多样性。

sentences.english: In addition its excellent conductivity avoids the introduction of temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 而碳化硅卓越的导热性则避免了引入温度梯度。

sentences.english: While as the temperature gradient is small out the deformation.
sentences.chinese: 同时轧件出变形区后温度梯度逐渐减小。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the temperature of different areas maybe a main factor for the differentiation of the TNW maize populations.
sentences.chinese: 影响其分化的主要因子可能为温度梯度造成。

sentences.english: The temperature gradient is typically caused by the power dissipated by the energized coil.
sentences.chinese: 温度梯度通常是由于被激励线圈所消耗的功率引起的。

sentences.english: The occurrence of temperature inversion leads to the departure of normal temperature gradient.
sentences.chinese: 山地逆温现象使正常的温度梯度发生改变。

sentences.english: The influence of the temperature gradient on the size and morphology of the crystals was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了温度梯度对氮化铝晶体尺寸大小和形态的影响。

sentences.english: This temperature gradient may be vital to successful hatching.
sentences.chinese: 这种温度梯度可能对成功孵化至关重要。

sentences.english: The effect of a temperature gradient should be included where appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 适当时应包括温度梯度效应。

sentences.english: Examples of interactions are mass transfer caused by temperature gradient .
sentences.chinese: 温度梯度所引起的品质转移是交叉作用的例子。

sentences.english: Minimizing temperature gradients within the circuit also reduces thermoelectric EMFs.
sentences.chinese: 将电路中的温度梯度减至最小也可以降低热电动势。

sentences.english: Nest construction can contribute to this temperature gradient.
sentences.chinese: 巢穴的构建可以助于这种温度梯度。

sentences.english: The reversal of meridional temperature gradient over South Asia is mainly a result of subsidence.
sentences.chinese: 造成南亚季风区经向温度梯度逆转的原因是下沉增温。

definition: (chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
